targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%Y-%m') AS month,
  COUNT(t.counterparty) AS '订单数'
FROM 
    transaction t
JOIN 
    transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE 
    tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
    AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
GROUP BY
  DATE_FORMAT(t.timestamp, '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY
  month ASC

SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '消费金额'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

panels.title: 都在哪家吃 & 花了多少钱

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '早餐'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
  AND HOUR(t.timestamp) BETWEEN 5 AND 10
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '中餐'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
  AND HOUR(t.timestamp) BETWEEN 11 AND 15
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '晚餐'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
  AND HOUR(t.timestamp) BETWEEN 16 AND 20
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '夜宵'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
  AND HOUR(t.timestamp) BETWEEN 21 AND 23
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '大半夜呢?'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag LIKE '%快餐%'
  AND HOUR(t.timestamp) BETWEEN 0 AND 4
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(t.timestamp, '%Y-%m') AS month,
  SUM(t.amount) AS '总金额'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag = '朴朴'
  AND tt.field = 'counterparty'
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
GROUP BY
  DATE_FORMAT(t.timestamp, '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY
  month ASC

SELECT
  t.timestamp AS '交易时间',
  t.category AS '订单分类',
  t.counterparty AS '商户名称',
  t.amount AS '消费金额'
FROM
  transaction t
  JOIN transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
  tt.tag = '朴朴'
  AND tt.field = 'counterparty'
  AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
ORDER BY
  t.timestamp DESC

panels.title: 都在哪家买 & 花了多少钱

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    COUNT(t.counterparty) AS '订单数'
FROM 
    transaction t
JOIN 
    transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE 
    tt.tag LIKE '%咖啡%'
    AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())

panels.title: 买了多少杯咖啡(订单数)

targets.rawSql:

JOIN

WHERE 
    tt.tag LIKE '%咖啡%'
    AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())

SELECT 
    SUM(t.amount) AS '总消费金额'
FROM 
    transaction t
JOIN 
    transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE 
    tt.tag = '瑞幸咖啡'
    AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())

SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(t.timestamp, '%Y-%m') AS '年-月',
    SUM(t.amount) AS '月支出'
FROM
    transaction t
JOIN
    transaction_tag tt ON t.counterparty = tt.value
WHERE
    tt.tag = '水费'
    AND tt.field = 'counterparty'
    AND t.timestamp BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())
GROUP BY
    DATE_FORMAT(t.timestamp, '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY
    DATE_FORMAT(t.timestamp, '%Y-%m')
